name: Handy Heroes
description:
A local Co-Op game about a group of handymen fixing a house.

Select the role of a Builder, a Plumber or Electrician and work together stop the house from collapsing.

Press button to join.

1-4 Players.

Can be played with Keyboard or Gamepads.

Controls:
Keyboard   GamepadMoveWASDLeft Stick or D-PadJumpSpaceA buttonPick/Use Tool
(Press or Hold)'E' keyX buttonClimb Stairs
'W' key
Up on Left Stick or D-Pad
Roles:

To select a role walk up to a tool and hold the Pick/UseTool button.

Builder:


Fixes Support Columns, Floors/Walls and clears fallen debris, is also the highest jumper.

Plumber:

Can help with Support Columns and can quickly fix broken Water Pipes, is also the best swimmer.

Electrician:

Fixes Wires by either Welding them or Cutting them, routes power to Ionizers to mitigate Water and is immune to Electric Sparks.

Goal

Fix the house 100% which includes Walls, Floors, Pipes, Dangerous Wires and Ionizers. Beware of Earthquakes which can cause damage to the building.
